org.opends.sdk.sasl
Interface SASLContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSASLContext, AnonymousSASLBindRequest, GenericSASLBindRequest
public interface SASLContext

SASL context that is used for the lifetime of the SASL bound connection.

getSASLCredentials

ByteString getSASLCredentials()
Returns the SASL credentials for this bind request.

Returns:
The SASL credentials for this bind request, or null if there are none or if the bind does not use SASL authentication.
